body.p: This section contains current and historically relevant vital signs, such as blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, height, weight, body mass index, head circumference, crown-to-rump length, and pulse oximetry. The section may contain all vital signs for the period of time being summarized, but at a minimum should include notable vital signs such as the most recent, maximum and/or minimum, or both, baseline, or relevant trends.
Vital signs are represented like other results (as defined in Results Section), but are aggregated into their own section in order to follow clinical conventions.
